title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Health Updates: resveratrol vs inflammation, obesity, diabetes; root veggies; listening to pleasurable music promotes... <!--more--> relaxation, wellbeing.
Commentary: China’s surge to power Dr David Richo is a clinical psychological therapist, author and spiritual leader. He combines Jungian, transpersonal & mythic perspectives in his work to address issues related to personal & spiritual growth & relationships.  He teaches at the University of California at Berkeley, Pacifica Graduate Institute & has been an instructor at the Esalen Institute in Big Sur, California.
  He is currently the clinical supervisor for the Community Counseling Center in Santa Barbara.
Dr Richo’s most recent book is “Daring to Trust: Opening Ourselves to Real Love and Intimacy.
” Understanding the dynamics of trust, how to discern real trust from naïve reaction and becoming more intimate with ourselves, others & the world.
